title: A Fun Playful Haven at i12 Katong Mall
blurb: A fun playful haven at i12 Katong Mall
description: A fun and playful indoor playground that offers a variety of play areas and activities for children of different ages. It is designed to provide a safe and stimulating environment where kids can explore, learn, and have fun. The playground features soft play equipment, climbing structures, slides, and interactive games that promote physical activity and cognitive development. It is a great place for families to spend quality time together, allowing children to unleash their imagination and creativity while parents can relax and enjoy the experience. The playground is suitable for toddlers and older children, with dedicated areas for different age groups to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience for everyone.
datetime_display: Please check the website or in-store for operating hours

title: Wan To Play: Fun-Filled Indoor Playground Experience
blurb: Enjoy hours of fun at Wan To Play indoor playground!
description: Wan To Play offers an exciting indoor playground experience for children. With a variety of engaging activities, kids can explore, play, and learn in a safe and stimulating environment. The playground features different zones, including Space, Ocean Fantasy, and Tropical Drift, each offering unique adventures. Children can enjoy climbing structures, slides, and interactive games designed to promote physical activity and cognitive development. Parents can relax and watch their children have a blast in this vibrant and well-maintained facility. Wan To Play is the perfect destination for families looking for a fun and memorable day out, providing endless entertainment and opportunities for kids to unleash their energy and creativity. The packages are valid for 365 days, ensuring flexibility for families to plan their visits.
datetime_display: Monday - Sunday 9 am - 9 pm OCEAN FANTASY Monday - Sunday 9 am - 10 pm
